title: "An unexpected error occurred while logging in"
body: I've been trying to log in all day but keep getting this message. I've downloaded and used the hextec repair tool, I've repaired and even deleted and reinstalled the game. Nothing changes it. I remember a similar thing happening a few weeks ago and others mentioned the same problem, but it didn't last this long. Any one know what I can do to fix it?

replies.body: Your network is probably just having a few problems getting a solid link with our login servers. Run through this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) paying attention to any firewalls that might be blocking league, and let me know if that helps.
I cleared the cookies and stuff and it's working again (wow, I can't imagine how dumb that must sound to someone who gets computers). Thank you.
Huh......yea that's a little weird, but hey whatever gets you back in the game!
I had the hextec thing make an exception for the firewall. I was able to play it no problem yesterday which is what confuses me most, but I'll go through the list and see if it helps. Thank you :)
